WorkItem.Description:
Both the firefox browser and command line viewer installed fine on my Fedora9 system. When open a .docx file with Firefox I get the following message:
File Not Found 
Firefox can't find the file at /DocX175670952/output.xhtml
 
Further, I checked that no file named output.xhtml was anywhere on my home partition or in /tmp.
In response to the command line
/usr/local/bin/OpenXMLViewer /home/olin/Desktop/MT1_oct03.docx  /home/olin/Desktop/
 
I get the response
********************************************************************************
********************************************************************************
 
                        Microsoft OpenXML Document Viewer
 
********************************************************************************
********************************************************************************
 
 
 
For more help, Please visit at  http://www.codeplex.com/OpenXMLViewer/ 
 
 
 
The specified file (null)/DocX175176124//input.docx does not exist, please enter the correct file path.
 
These seem related and likely an enviroment variable problem.

Comments.Message: As you have guessed, it seems to be a problem with environment variable. The TMPDIR variable should be present pointing to the temp folder of the OS.
